intro: In this cell, your luck buys you one more day.
description:
CloverPit: Devil’s Gambit drops you in a grimy cell with nothing but a cursed slot machine, a hungry ATM, and a debt that grows sharper every round. Pay up or drop into the pit — those are your choices.

Every spin is a gamble with your life. Rig the machine with strange charms, chain wild combos, and watch your winnings snowball… or vanish in an instant. The further you push your luck, the crueler the pit becomes.

This is a rogue-lite about temptation and survival, where greed can save you just as easily as it can ruin you. Twist the odds, outsmart the house, and claw your way toward freedom before the pit swallows you whole.
